multiagent.dpop

Class Relation

  • java.lang.Object
    • multiagent.dpop.Relation

  • class Relation
extends java.lang.Object
    Class used to simulate a relation table as for the DPOP problem. Use this to store and propagate utility values bottom up in the tree.
    Author:
    Albani Dario

      • updateValue

        protected void updateValue(int row,
                           int col,
                           int newValue)
        Update the value at position row, col with the new given value
        Parameters:
        row, - the variable related to the children node
        col, - the variable related to the parent node
        newValue, - the new value to update

      • updateUtilMessage

        private void updateUtilMessage()
        Update the utility message with the new values in input. This method is call every time an update occur in the utility table of the relation.

      • getUtilMessage

        public java.util.LinkedList<java.lang.Integer> getUtilMessage()

      • joinUtilMessages

        public java.util.LinkedList<java.lang.Integer> joinUtilMessages(java.util.LinkedList<java.lang.Integer> util)
        Implements the join between two different utility messages. this and util must be of the same length.
        Returns:
        a single utility message that is the element wise sum of the two in input

      • projectUtilMessages

        public java.util.LinkedList<java.lang.Integer> projectUtilMessages(java.util.LinkedList<java.lang.Integer> util)
        Implements the projection of an utility message into the utility table of this relation as defined in the DPOP framework.
        Parameters:
        util, - must have the same number of column as the current util table
        Returns:
        a single utility message

        public boolean equals(java.lang.Object o)
